CHEMICALS

ketamine

Modern humans must learn how to relate to psychoactives responsibly, treating them with respect and awareness, working to minimize harms and maximize benefits, and integrating use into a healthy, enjoyable, and productive life.

Ketamine



COMMON & BRAND NAMES

K; Special K; Cat Tranquilizer


                    Context:

It also includes general informational links about Erowid, legal, support, and contact details, situating it within the broader context of reference materials and organizational information on psychoactive substances presented in the full document.

content:
Drug: Ketamine | cid: 3821
Source: erowid | Source description: Information about Ketamine including basics, effects, dosage, history, legal status, photos, research, media coverage, and links to other resources.
Erowid name: ketamine
Category: CHEMICALS
Field: MainPage

                    Text: 
                    Ketamine



COMMON & BRAND NAMES

K; Special K; Cat Tranquilizer

EFFECTS CLASSIFICATION

Dissociative Anaesthetic; Psychedelic

CHEMICAL NAME

2-(2-chlorophenyl)-2-(methylamino)-cyclohexanone

DESCRIPTION

Ketamine is a dissociative psychedelic used medically as a veterinary and human anaesthetic. It is one of the few addictive psychedelics and is associated with researcher John Lilly.

BASICS

EFFECTS

IMAGES

HEALTH

LAW

DOSE

CHEMISTRY

GENERAL INFORMATION #

Ketamine FAQ

Variation in Effects between Batches of Ketamine

Ketamine & Drug Tests

Miscellaneous Dissociative Info

General Ketamine Info

Ketamine Bits & Pieces

HISTORY #

Ketamine Timeline

CHARACTERS #

John Lilly

HEALTH #

Ketamine Fatalities / Deaths

KLUTS: Ketamine and Lower Urinary Tract Symptoms

Ketamine and Depression

This is your Brain on Dissociatives

The Bad News Isn't In

Ketamine for Worms

ASK EROWID ANSWERS #

What substances are "K" and "G"?


                    Context: 
                    This section provides a detailed overview of ketamine, including its common names, classification, chemical name, description, and key topics such as effects, health, law, history, and related questions. It is part of the larger chemicals index on the webpage, offering comprehensive information for research, harm reduction, and legal considerations related to ketamine.
